label: Temporary Housing and Relocation Services
description: Short-term and long-term housing options and relocation services for individuals and corporations.

subcategories.label: Short-Term Housing
subcategories.description: Furnished apartments and rentals for stays of less than six months.

subcategories.label: Long-Term Housing
subcategories.description: Unfurnished apartments and rentals for stays of six months or longer.

subcategories.label: Relocation Services
subcategories.description: Assistance with moving to a new city or country.

subcategories.label: Temporary Phone Numbers
subcategories.description: Apps and services that provide temporary phone numbers for privacy and security.

subcategories.label: Military Housing
subcategories.description: Housing options for military personnel and their families.
